```{r}
library(tidyverse)

raw_data <- jsonlite::fromJSON("watch-history.json")

raw_data %>% 
  filter(activityControls == "YouTube watch history",
         time > '2024-01-01' & time < '2024-12-31') %>% 
  unnest(subtitles) %>% 
  select(title, channel = name, time) %>%
  count(channel, sort = T)
```
